comment: Professor Phillips was a very nice teacher. She did take attendance in class. In class assignments were very easy. There was an online textbook that was weekly and graded for completion at the end of the semester. The midterm and final were both online and open note. Sometimes had trouble hearing but not a problem. Definitely would take again.

Professor Phillips is one of the best teachers I could have had being a new student. She's very understanding and truly wants to help you learn and be successful in her class. Great class to help you learn how to communicate professionally and effectively in everyday life.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Great teacher! Professor Philips was very kind and passionate about what she taught. Just be prepared for you will have homework due almost every Sunday plus you'll typically have a graded assignment after most classes.
This was the easiest class I have ever taken. If you get anything under an A, it's your fault. Tests are taken at home and homework is an easy 100.

Prof. Phillips was very kind and cares a lot about her students. Her lectures were long and often very difficult to pay attention to. The weekly textbook work was easy but time-consuming. Grade was calculated on daily assignments through D2L and the tests are open note and open book. Very easy, kind, and lenient professor.
Jan was my FAVORITE professor I've ever taken through KSU. Her class was very easy, all tests open book, weekly assignments due. Loved her. Would recommend to ANYONE.
amazing awesome and caring she is one of the best teachers and is very enthusiastic about teaching something she loves. all assignments are short and easy. really just an awesome person!!

I really enjoyed Prof. Philips class, she's an excellent lecturer and as long as you stay on top of the weekly Revel assignments, it's very easy. She shows a lot of care for her students, and clearly knows what she is doing/talking about. There were a couple group/partner activities but not too many. Definitely recommend her.
Lectures were actually interesting, and I actually learned a lot of new things from them. Class was super easy A as long as you do the work, would highly recommend
Professor Phillips was a very nice caring lady. If you don't like group work though this class isn't for you. Overall her class is very easy. Just show up and do your work and you will pass. EASY A.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Pro. Phillips was probably the best professor I have ever had. She doesn't assign alot of work only weekly homework (super easy) and a group discussion at least once a week but all and all super easy professor and easy A.

She is a very kind and caring woman. In the class, you get assigned to small groups and throughout the semester you work with them. Weekly assignments on Revel but are easy if you can keep up with them. The most difficult part of her class are the tests, yet they are EXACTLY like her study guides so it's not even that bad. I would recommend her
To the point.  Come to class.  Take good notes or record.  She provides course chapter outlines and study guide.  Can't miss.  Great teacher.  Friendly too.

Gives a study guide and most of the stuff on there is on the test. the tests ARENT HARD AT ALL. I usually did the study guide the night before and still got high B's. studying would surely get you an A. ver nice teacher and you will learn a lot. TAKE HERRRR!!!
